Title: Son Goku's Final Blow... Planet Namek Scatters Throughout Space
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Toshio Furukawa
Plot: Goku's ill-advised display of mercy leads to a treacherous final attack by Frieza. As the epic battle between the two warriors reaches its climax, planet Namek teeters on the brink of ultimate destruction!
